name: Mormon Channel Radio for Roku
tagline: Stream Mormon Channel Radio directly to your Roku.
body:
### Getting Started.
Get started by downloading the latest [zip archive](https://github.com/Todd-Struiksma/Mormon-Channel-Radio/archive/master.zip)(~0.5MB). The archive includes the source and needed images.  

     md5: eb16a6feb52051e068ee7263cd9b1003
     sha1: 94d770ef8aa16931c7fd42fa86e034248222b13e

### Start Editing
You can always use Notepad, TextEdit, or Gedit to make changes to the code. But here are a few fan favorites that may make your life a bit easier. If syntax highlighting is your thing, make sure "BrightScript" is offered. 
* [Notepad++](http://notepad-plus-plus.org/)
* [Brackets](http://brackets.io/) 
* [Sublime Text](http://www.sublimetext.com/)
* [Atom](https://atom.io/)


### Compatibility
Designed and tested with two second generation Roku LT (2400, and 2450) models.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
